text: No job   k of student debt  just got word one collection agency is taking me to court  I m so done with life I was depressed all though college  and the only thing that kept me going was  I should get my degree  It was a very obvious and easy to see end goal  so I kept going to classes  got my degree  and then thought about killing myself It s been   years  and in that time  I ve made almost   progress  I briefly had a job at Starbucks but I quit that  I m at home  eating myself into obesity  making no payments on any of my loans  and generally feeling like shit   Now it s gotten to the point where I just got served court papers for one of my loans It s not that I m afraid about that  I literally have no money  no bank account  nothing they can take from me  I don t care about my credit  which must be at   after   years of delinquency on loans  I guess the court papers just made me remember what a fuck up I ve been since  I ve been sitting on my computer pretty much exclusively for the last   years  trying to entertain myself with YouTube and music and stuff  to keep away from the dark thoughts  but maybe this is a sign it s been long enough putting it off
summary: One collection agency is taking him to court for defaulting on one of his student loans. He has no money, no bank account, and no job. He was depressed in college, but kept going to classes to get his degree. He briefly had a job at Starbucks, but he quit because he was depressed.
cleaned: collection agency take court default student loan no money no bank account no job depress college keep go class degree briefly job starbuck quit depressed

text: Alone At A BarHey guys  I m chilling out at a bar by myself I keep swiping through my phone contacts and seeing the sparse list that is presented There is no one that I can contact  so I feel a bit alone at the moment I just keep wondering how things turned out like this Alone  scared to interact with people  a gambler  probably would turn into an alcoholic if I actually tried I just hate where I am at right now   In a sense  I just wonder if this is karmic punishment for something that I did Cursed with boredom and isolation I love my family  but holy shit I want to get out of this life I ve tried to commit suicide a few times  pills  stabbing  etc  but nothing works It s like I m just stuck I dunno I m just scared to die  but I want to get this shit show over with
